name: Mesh Analyser
short_description:
Mesh Analyser is a new project that is still in its beginnings and under development. The idea is to build different functions to help the users analyse the meshes they are working with.
Meshes are used in different applications : finite element modelling, virtual sculpting, animations, games, ... A knowledge of some mesh properties (meshes element quality, smoothness, distance between different meshes, ...) appeares to be  crutial in many situations. This tolbox will propose different functions that help acquire information on a triangular mesh.
summary: A Matlab based toolbox to analyse triangular meshes
